content: Up for grabs are 5x graded physical crypto coins  LOT 1: 2018 Genesis LS1 Litecoin #122, antique silver color alloy MS68https://chainz.cryptoid.info/ltc/address.dws?LSoTrCJzcQn9w87Y3DaKEA7JTmksCtkv3g.htmSTARTING BID: 0.0025BTCLOT 2: 2018 Genesis LS1 Litecoin #112, antique gold color alloy MS67https://chainz.cryptoid.info/ltc/address.dws?LWPNRtKWijA2reqxWm5tuo6UimXPvL4wea.htmSTARTING BID: 0.0025BTCLOT 3: 2021 1HodlClub Bitcoin #30, silver/gilt MS67PLhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1xBTCy1jSzkio89xRqCzZLDRSim4kVk7V.htmSTARTING BID: 0.0045BTCLOT 4: 2018 Moonbits #T2451, plated alloy MS65https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?15ryTcGaqd7CNEzAxmE9qCCfWQhAYC8MsR.htmSTARTING BID: 0.0020BTCLOT 5: 2022 Chad 5000 Francs, silver MS69STARTING BID: 0.0020BTC**Winner of the lot that receives the biggest bid gap from original starting bid will get a bonus coin.**STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 17th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
